channel.title: Delete inactive users?
channel.description: hey i was wondering how do i delete accounts that havent been played for 3 days on my server without having to go through every single one?!

item.title: Delete inactive users?
item.dc:creator: @ingo345 ingo345
item.description:
@ingo345 wrote:

well i dont no what u mean lol… they go to the character files…

item.title: Delete inactive users?
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Depends on how your saving them and the format i which you are doing it. How are you saving the players last login because I could make you a simple program to run if you explain your saving in a bit more details.
Just post everything explaining your saving.

Read full topic
